roleset.name: seem like
roleset.note: RESEMBLE-V NOTES: Args 1 and 2 because this can't take a passive alternation: Johnresembles an idiot / *An idiot is resembled by John. (from resemble.01-v)

example.name: very typical
example.text: Although some of the study's recommendations resemble those of similar projects, the makeup of the task force was unusually diverse, adding significance to the effort.
